title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 3-8.10 - Impact of certain corporate acquisitions on the PNOLC subtraction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 3-8.10 - Impact of certain corporate acquisitions on the PNOLC subtraction

State Regulations

In a transaction to which IRC section 381(a) applies, the
acquiring corporation shall succeed to the balance of the PNOLC subtraction
allotments and unused PNOLC subtraction carryforward of the distributor or
transferor corporation, subject to the same restrictions and limitations on the
use of the PNOLC subtraction allotments and unused PNOLC subtraction
carryforward to which the distributor or transferor corporation was
subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
3-8.10

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
